name: Irritating Bean Simulator
description:
Welcome to IBS! (Irritating Bean Simulator, not to be confused with IBS, irritable bowel syndrome)

This is Mac Os only, but you can play the optimised version on Newgrounds!

This is heavily inspired by Dani's Karlson, so if you've played that then you know the controls. This was my first ever unity game so excuse the bad quality.
